leadingComments.value: Place in top-left corner of screen regardless of scroll position.

trailingComments.value: Ensure it has a small width and height. Setting to 1px / 1em
doesn't work as this gives a negative w/h on some browsers.

leadingComments.value: Ensure it has a small width and height. Setting to 1px / 1em
doesn't work as this gives a negative w/h on some browsers.

trailingComments.value: We don't need padding, reducing the size if it does flash render.

leadingComments.value: We don't need padding, reducing the size if it does flash render.

trailingComments.value: Avoid flash of white box if rendered for any reason.

doesn't work as this gives a negative w/h on some browsers.
